abstract: James T Reynolds Sr and charities Cancer Fund of America and Cancer Support Services settle fraud case brought against them by Federal Trade Commission and all 50 states; agree to pay $75.8 million judgment and to dissolve businesses.

headline.print_headline: Cancer Charities Will Pay Fine for Fraud, and Then Dissolve
headline.main: Cancer Charities Will Pay Fine for Fraud, and Then Dissolve

snippet: Two cancer charities labeled “shams” by the F.T.C. have agreed to a $75.8 million judgment and the dissolution of the businesses.
lead_paragraph: Two cancer charities labeled “shams” by the F.T.C. have agreed to a $75.8 million judgment and the dissolution of the businesses.
